Lugia (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0248: Tyranitar
Pokémon
#0250: Ho-Oh →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Lugia (TCG Pocket).

Lugia has been featured on 30 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Lugia cards are normally Colorless-type, Psychic-type, or Water-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Lugia

Lugia
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
